title: (No. 49 of 2015)) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of 2005) (as adapted
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Garda Síochána (Admissions and
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Garda Síochána (Admissions and 

Appointments) (Amendment) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited garda siochana (admissions appointments) (amendment) regulation 2020

title: (No. 49 of 2015)) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of 2005) (as adapted
heading: 2. The Garda Síochána (Admissions and Appointments) Regulations 2013
text_raw:
2. The Garda Síochána (Admissions and Appointments) Regulations 2013 
(S.I. No. 470 of 2013) are amended in Regulation 4(b)(i)(I) by the substitution 
of “an EEA State, the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland or 
the Swiss Confederation,” for “an EEA State or the Swiss Confederation,”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 15th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Government hereby approve of the foregoing Regulations. 

[602] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 December, 2020. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [602] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
